name: Pearl Izumi Quest Thermal Jersey - Men's
description: A warm, long sleeved jersey to suit smooth cornering and steady efforts on cold days. A full-length zipper lets you get the air flowing, and highly efficient wicking keeps you dry and comfortable throughout your ride. The elasticized hem has a grippy finish for excellent stay-put power.Made of Select Thermal Fleece fabric for exceptional warmth and moisture transfer.3 back drop-in pockets fit a light windbreaker and a handful of gels.Drop back hem has a gripper for reliable coverage when you're in full tuck.
